p: Antinociceptive effects of 1 were also observed in the nociceptive response induced in the 1% formalin test. It was reduced in a significant manner at all doses tested resembling the effect of diclofenac, but this effect was not observed in a dose-dependent manner in both neurogenic ( F 4,25 = 11.57, p < 0.001) ( Figure 6(A)) and inflammatory ( F 4,25 = 12.40, p < 0.001) ( Figure 6(B)) phases like in the writhing test.
